Title: Jin's Look
Actors: Burak Kuchuk, Seyhan Chakaloghlu, Sila Ildemlik
Plot: 'Jin's Look'is based on a cold-blooded incident that began in the village of Kanlybel. Kind and beloved by all Karim, falls in love with someone who should not be loved, and does many things to achieve his goal. There are many disputes between the family of Karim and the girl and forbidden rites are performed. Now Karim himself must reveal this mystical story.
Subtitle: Azerbaijani

Title: Time Traveler
Writer: Matt Reeves, Peter Craig, Bob Kane
Actors: Lou de Laage, Rafael Personas, Isabelle Carré
Plot: Paris, 2052. Julia travels through her life in search of events that changed her fate. Sometimes it's something big, like a national music competition, and sometimes it's something as small as a passport left at home. A trifle that, years later, ruins your entire career and life.
Subtitle: Turkish

Title: The Shazam
Actors: Diedrich Bader, Zachary Levi, Grays Fulton
Plot: The continuation of the adventures of a teenager who, at critical moments, with the help of a magic word, can turn into a superhero.
Subtitle: Turkish

Title: Puss In Boots 2 - The Last Wish
Writer: Richard Claus, Brian Cleveland, Jason Cleveland
Plot: Everyone's favorite bold, fearless and such a touching cat is back! Puss in Boots has spent eight of his nine lives and is now embarking on a new adventure! The charismatic rogue, accompanied by the adorable Kitty Softpaws and the chatty dog Perro, embark on an epic journey to find the mythical Wishing Star and see if cats really only have 9 lives... or are there alternatives?
Subtitle: Turkish

Title: Zona
Actors: Majid Guseynov, Tural Asadov, Faig Mirzayev, Taleh Yuzbayov, Agil M Guliyev
Plot: The main character gets a job in one of the city's collection companies. He collects debts from people who refuse to pay banks. Everything is going well until one of the borrowers is found dead. The police sees the main character at the scene of the incident and arrests him. Since all the evidence is against him, the court deprives him of his freedom. The main part of the film takes place in a place reminiscent of Guantanamo prison. The hero tries to escape from there and prove his innocence. But escape from this prison is impossible.
Subtitle: Azerbaijani

Title: Avatar The Way Of Water
Actors: Mishel Yeo, Zoi Saldana, Keyt Uinslet
Plot: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the planet of Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their planet
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. 4 wins & 16 nominations total
Subtitle: Turkish

Title: Hayaller Ülkesi
Actors: Miranda Tapsell, Ross Noble, Kate Murphy
Plot: Little opossum Kerry dreams of celebrating Christmas with snow, because this is what creates a real holiday spirit, a cozy atmosphere and indescribable children's delight! Fortunately, there is a Tree nearby that can fulfill wishes. You just need to find a flower and say what you want. Everything is very simple, but something went wrong - and everything around froze, and the Tree itself was dying. Now Kerry must, by all means, correct what she has done.
Subtitle: Turkish

Title: John Wick 4
Actors: Keanu Reeves, Donnie Yen, Bill Skarsgård
Plot: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating the High Table, but before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into new foes.
